name: Scooter Olympics
description:
Grab your Scooter and join the fierce competition that is the Scooter Olympics! Race against your friends with Local Split-screen multiplayer in this competitive 3D Runner for PC. 

This game still in early stages of development. Assets used are from Mixamo, and Unreal Marketplace. Songs were purchased on different stores. Hope you guys like it! Any feedback is very welcome!

- How to play:

  • Player 1 will be on the left side and will use a keyboard to play.
  • Player 2 will be on the right side and will use a Joystick to play.

- Controls:

  • Player 1: "A" and "D" to move character and "Spacebar" to jump.
  • Player 2: Left Thumbstick to move character and "A" (Xbox Controller) or "X" (PS4 Controller).
